The challenge: Launch 2 rockets, with or without Mechjeb into opposite orbits, heading at each other. Try to get them to pass as closely together as possible without hitting each other.

The rules: Any Mods, as long as they are not overpowered. Pictures not required.

The Scores:--Excalibur-- 167.4 METERS from other ship

Take a picture while the ship is heading towards yours, at closest approach, and as it heads away. Make sure the prograde indicator can be seen on the navball on the active ship, and compare the METs. You might need to get the approach and departure pictures from some distance to get clearly different METs, but it can easily be done.
